org.apache.lenya.util
Class Query

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.lenya.util.Query

public class Query
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class to analyze a query string of the form key1=value1&key2=value2&....

Invalid parts (not a valid key-value-pair) are omitted.
